QuestData.Title: As the Land Shatters
QuestData.Description: What in the world was that, $n?$B$BThose were not cannons or catapults, that is for sure.$B$BGo outside and see what is going on.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prince Liam Greymane at the Allen Farmstead.
QuestData.RewardText: The ocean, $n. It swallowed everything... the land... the Forsaken... our men!
